de.weltraumschaf.ebnf.visitor
Class Xml

java.lang.Object
  de.weltraumschaf.ebnf.visitor.Xml
All Implemented Interfaces:
Visitor
public class Xml
extends Object
implements Visitor

Visitor which generates a XML string from the visited AST tree.

Author:
Sven Strittmatter
